en.name: Deepwood Memories
en.4p: After Elemental Skills or Bursts hit opponents, the targets' Dendro RES will be decreased by 30% for 8s. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is not on the field.

zh.name: 深林的记忆
zh.4p: 元素战技或元素爆发命中敌人后，使命中目标的草元素抗性降低30%，持续8秒。装备者处于队伍后台时，依然能触发该效果。
